definition: Han Han (1982-), PRC blogger, singer and professional rally driver
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: Is Hanhan's "Lottery Agency" a talent scout or merely the commercial speculation?
sentences.chinese: 韓寒的“彩票投注站”，是伯樂相馬還是商業炒作？

sentences.english: He is a professional racecar driver and author.
sentences.chinese: 韓寒既是一名職業賽車手也是一位職業作家。

sentences.english: Even if the blog click-through rate, although the Han Han a little more, but the GJM is not bad.
sentences.chinese: 即使博客點擊率，雖然韓寒多一點，但郭敬明也不差。

sentences.english: Compared to those who were criminalized for speaking, Han Han has no courage.
sentences.chinese: 比起那些已經因言獲了罪的，韓寒算是沒有勇氣的。
有人可能會說，韓寒天賦異稟。

sentences.english: He is a professional race car driver and author.
sentences.chinese: 韓寒既是一名職業賽車手也是一位職業作家。

sentences.english: Han and his navigator remained unhurt.
sentences.chinese: 韓寒和他的領航員都未受傷。

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
to pull a face/to grimace/to scowl
not to engage in honest work/to ignore one's proper occupation/not to attend to one's proper duties
lit. dress up as God, play the devil (idiom); fig. to mystify/to deceive people/to scam
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
